snippet: Two officers detailed an encounter with Mr. Alexis at a Marriott in which he said that after an argument at a Virginia airport, the person “had sent three people to follow him and to keep him awake by talking to him and sending vibrations to his...
lead_paragraph: Two officers detailed an encounter with Mr. Alexis at a Marriott in which he said that after an argument at a Virginia airport, the person “had sent three people to follow him and to keep him awake by talking to him and sending vibrations to his body” via a microwave.

headline.main: Newport, R.I., Police Report on Aaron Alexis
